charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard that Team
Break kidnapped a child...
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1101_0200:
and decided to infiltrate their hideout with Dawn
and Lucas.
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_0300:
I wonder where that kid is... Maybe they’re
farther in?
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_0400: We can’t hear their conversation from here.
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_0500: Why’d we hafta kidnap a brat like that, anyway?
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_0600:
Apparently, she overheard us talking about
our plans.
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_0700:
I can’t hear what they’re saying, but we have to
hurry and save that kid!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_0800:
But...if we just barge in on them, they might do
something to the kid!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_0401_1000: I might have an idea. Leave it to me!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_0402_1200: Yeah! Actually, I might have an idea!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_1500:
The protector of dreams and the guardian of
children’s smiles!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_1600:
The shining moonlight led me to you! I’m Sygna
Suit Dawn, the Knight of the Crescent Moon!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_1700: Seriously, who the heck are you?
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_1800:
Bwahahaha! What, you’re pretending to be
some kinda hero?
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_2000:
You’re the ones who should be embarrassed! You
think it’s cool to pick on people weaker than you?
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_2100:
Kidnapping children is a crime, and you’re in big
trouble, misters!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_2200:
Oh yeah? What’re you gonna do about it? We’ve
got ourselves a handy little hostage!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_2300:
Think again! We just saved your hostage, so you
can’t hold that over us anymore!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_2400:
What?! When did that happen?! Wait...
So that was all just a distraction?!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_2500:
Now we’re evenly matched, and we don’t have to
worry about your hostage! Are you ready for your
punishment now?
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_2800: Phew! That takes care of it!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_3000:
That was scary! But then you came and it wasn’t
scary anymore!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_3100: That’s good to hear! You were so brave!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_3500:
I bet she was tired. She was in a tense situation,
after all.
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_3800:
It’s one of Cresselia’s feathers. I’m giving it to her
so she’ll have sweet dreams!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_3900:
I see. After such a scary event, she might have
nightmares, huh.
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_4000: Anyway, what was up with that plan, Lucas?!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_4100:
I mean...it seemed like something you’d do, right?
You told me before that you like heroes and stuff.
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_4200: That was when we were kids!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_4300: That said, you were pretty into it!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_4500:
That’s because, in front of that little girl,
I wanted to be a hero—just like the
heroes I used to look up to.
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_4600: I guess it was a little embarrassing, though...
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_0401_4800: Th-thanks! I’m glad you thought so.
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_5100: Then maybe I can work even harder!
charaepi_ch0116_10_hikari/2301_1201_5200:
Cresselia and I will keep working together to
protect everyone we meet! *chuckle*
